text: Spring on the Oder () is a 1967 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Saakov.Как Людмиле Чурсиной хантыйский оберег подарилиВЕСНА НА ОДЕРЕ It stars Anatoliy Kuznetsov, Anatoliy Grachyov, and Lyudmila Chursina. == Actors == * Anatoliy Kuznetsov as Lubentsov * Anatoliy Grachyov as Chokhov * Lyudmila Chursina as Tanya * Georgi Zhzhyonov as Ryzheusy * Yury Solomin as Meshcherski * Pyotr Shcherbakov as Sizokrylov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1967 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Spring on the Oder
